reviewText: This video was great I really enjoy all of the Louie Giglio dvds. You can view all the dvds at louiegiglio.com and they are all very interesting.
This video is great as usual with Louie Giglio speaking. Especially good for teens and college people but also for us older folks.

I love a bold message of truth that I can see and hear again and again.  Louie Giglio hit this one out of the park!!!  Our church used this DVD as the basis for a Men's Retreat last year.  It deeply touched the hearts of the dozen or so men involved, including one conversion to Jesus Christ!  It is thoroughly Biblical and easy to comprehend with many excellent object lessons on grace and Christian living.  There is an Adobe file on the DVD that has excellent questions for discussion of each session.  I plan to use this teaching tool again in the community where my family recently moved.  To the glory of God...Five stars!

Louie Giglio is awesome to watch and listen too.  I am a new Christian and Louie gets me so excited to love Jesus. He is funny, brings in real life moments and when I am done watching him I want more! I have purchased many of Louie's DVD's and love them all.  They are great for any age group, my 16yr. old son really enjoys watching them.

As you can read in the product information, this is 5 sermons on Grace by Louie Giglio.  We are currently using this for a Bible study, and it is meaty and biblical, yet still fine for new believers.

I have a number of his other videos, The Heart of Passion and the 12 Words of Christmas, and they seem more geared to new believers.  This Grace DVD is more like actual sermons where you follow along in your Bible.  New believers would not feel weird or lost, but this is still meatier than when he does his presentations on the road.

We have people who can't attend every week, but this is still easy to follow no matter how many you hear.  There is no study guide or other book to buy, so for a group watching expenses this is also perfect.  I highly recommend this for individuals, groups, and Sunday school classes!
5 Sermons in one Video!  All have something we can apply to our lives.  Insight into Grace underserved and how we become Righteous in God's eyes through no effort of our own.
Great DVD!  Louie Giglio has so much enthusiasm it is contagious!
Louie Giglio is outstanding in all his videos and this is no exception.
Great teachings on Grace by Louie. Wont be disappointed if you purchase this dvd.
We enjoyed this one, too!  He has such passion...

WOW what a message. It takes a while to go through all four or five titles, but don't miss one of them. It is great and you will never see the Grace of God in the same light. I am so happy that Giglio allows God to work through him in a very special way. How we need more men of God like this. The world is hurting and turned up side down and only God can help and heal our wrongs, but someone has to preach God's Word and Giglio does just that.

It is the best description of Grace and ow we should be related to our God that I have viewed, read or seen in many days and posibblibly years.  Louie Giglio is inventive in his own way and clearly presents what heis saying and means.  He can bring laughter as well as tears in his presentation.  You need an open mind and heart when viewing.
This will open your eyes!!

this is an amazing teaching - Louie has such a powerful, refreshing perspective in all his teachings but Grace (the One and Only) is one I could listen to constantly because you just can't get enough of God's grace.
Giglio at his very best! a unique  way to intro JESUS to others!!!
Another view on GRACE from someone who knows what they are talking about. It is a nice, easy to read book
This is a wonderful DVD teaching about God's Grace.  It is very easy to understand and remember the teaching on Grace.

I have found each and every CD by Pastor Giglio awesome.  He is inspiring and his love and enthusiam for the Lord and his Word
is truly infectious!  He leads us into true worship.
Louie Giglio is an awesome speaking. His excitement  for the word is contatiguous. would recommend this DVD to everyone . Wonderful
Because he started using man's word instead of God's!!! In order to obtain a copyright a bible must change the meaning of the words Two hundred times!!! KJV or man you choose.
He speaks in a down to earth way of illustrating and opened by eyes to see my relationship to God in a new light. Fantastic.
I watch this over and over to remind myself of the tools and blessing of Grace. Louie is informative and inspiring
Louis Giglio holds my attention as always. He gives great insight on God's grace in our daily lives and I can apply his message to my own life.

Lou Giglio is a great speaker and teacher as well as very easy to listen to. He adds humor and simplicity to his teaching so it is easy to understand on every level. Teaching are broken down to different subjects so it does not take a lot of time to listen to a teaching and the time goes quickly with a great speaker. Love his DVDs.

I was blown away by this dvd! I was actually hesitant to buy it at first because I've heard so much preaching on grace that I thought this would just be another run of the mill lesson on it that I would regret purchasing in the end, but that couldn't be any further from the truth. To start with, there are 5 full length talks on this single dvd! All of which are at least 45 min. in length! Every talk tells the story of grace from the beginning on how we acquire it from God to the "mission field" and how we apply it in this world! I am such a huge fan of Louie because of the passion series (which I also own)! That's the reason I went through with this purchase without knowing much about it prior to buying it. This is the most amazing presentation of grace in its entirety that I have ever witnessed! I will most certainly be utilizing this dvd to witness, to study, and to teach for years to come! Add a copy of this to your cart now and begin to enjoy all this life changing information for yourself now for an extremely low price! The value far outweighs the price here! This is a steal! This dvd is worth every penny and way more!
Louie Giglio helped me learn a different angle with new and refreshing information from the same Bible I read.  How awesome our Lord God is.
The message was great, had some difficulty with disc but was replaced.
Good Read!
As expected
excellent
LOVE!!!  Awwsome!!!
More than "more than worth the price"!  EXCELLENT!
LOVE LOVE LOVE IT! So glad that I ordered this product....a must for all.  Great packaging and shipping time.....thanks  again for a great product!!
loved it
SUPER TEACHING.......WE ALL LOVED IT
I used this video series for a small bible study group I lead. I really enjoy when a teacher digs deep into scripture and teaches you what the bible says about Jesus.
